title: Outcome Group/Set schema definition
description: An outcome is the result of making a decision. Outcomes are often tailored specifically to the stakeholder context in which the decision is being made. We call the set of possible outcomes for a decision an Outcome Set.

schemaVersion.description: Schema version used to represent this Outcome Group

key.description: A key (a short, unique string) that can be used to identify the Outcome in a shorthand way

name.description: A short label that captures the description of the Decision Point or the Group of Decision Points.

description.description: Description of the Decision Point Value

version.description: Version (a semantic version string) that identifies this object

name.description: A short label that captures the description of the group of Outcomes

description.description: Description of the of group of Outcomes.
